changeSet.author: CONNECT_APP
changeSet.sql: -- ALREADY EXECUTED FOR PRE AND PRO, PLEASE DO NOT RUN IT ANY MORE INSERT INTO [dbo].[COLLECTION_PERMISSION] (COLLECTION_ID, ESHOP_PERMISSION_ID) SELECT orgCol.ID, p.ID FROM ESHOP_PERMISSION p, ORGANISATION_COLLECTION orgCol JOIN ORGANISATION org on orgCol.AFFILIATE_ID= org.ID JOIN ORGANISATION_TYPE orgType on org.ORGTYPE_ID = orgType.ID WHERE orgType.[LEVEL] = 2 AND org.SHORTNAME='matik-ch' AND p.PERMISSION = 'OIL'
